CustomField.description: This is used for quarterly reporting purpose.
CustomField.formula:
IF(
Year_Billed__c = TEXT(YEAR(today())),
CASE(Quarter_Billed__c, 'Q1', Date(year(today()),3,31), 'Q2', Date(year(today()),6,30), 'Q3',Date(year(today()),9,30), Date(year(today()),12,31)),
Date(0000, 0, 0))
CustomField.label: Current Quarter
